nodes.text: Braggan's Fist was a group of thugs that operated in and around the city of Tyrena on the core world Corellia.
The organization was founded and led by Kal Braggan, a disgraced CorSec officer who had been framed by another CorSec officer, Wilfred Quelsh, for a crime that he didn't commit.

Circa 1 ABY, the Corellian Medal of Honor of Lieutenant Colonel Wilfred Quelsh was reported stolen. After Quelsh asked an independent agent to investigate the theft, Quelsh's aide Edbr Yamagh pointed the spacer to the thugs of Braggan's Fist, because he suspected their involvement. The spacer tried to make the thugs talk at gunpoint, but they claimed to know nothing. However they let slip that Braggan had been acting odd and had disappeared into hiding. They also revealed the location of their main camp near Tyrena where the agent found Braggan's datapad and the coordinates of Braggan's hiding place. The agent later discovered that Quelsh had murdered Braggan.
Around the same time, CorSec Sergeant Hus recruited a spacer to recover some stolen goods from the Braggan's Fist thugs in their camp.

The members of Braggan's Fist were Non-Player Characters (NPCs) in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Braggan's Fist was added to the game with the update named "Chapter 1: The Corellian Captives", published on June 8, 2006. The gang members could be found in the slums of Tyrena and a camp half a kilometer outside of the city. They were part of the quest "CorSec Case Files: Stolen Honor" which was part of the Legacy quest line, the longest quest line in the game.
